response.answer_text: Paul Mockapetris Paul Mockapetris expanded the Internet beyond its academic origins by inventing the Domain Name System (DNS) in 1983. Paul Mockapetris | Internet Hall of Fame https://internethalloffame.org/inductees/paul-mockapetris
The idea of domains was invented by Elizabeth Feinler who maintained the list of internet addresses until 1989. The DNS system was created by Paul Mockapetris.
